article: a short midlevel cleric , with a neat white beard and a clergyman 's calm bearing , mehdi karroubi has watched from his home in tehran in recent months as his aides have been arrested , his offices raided , his newspaper shut down .
abstract: a lone cleric is loudly defying iran s leaders
